content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. I am sure you will find my apartment to your liking. Now, about the rental price, I am looking for a monthly rent of €1,000. Remember, this is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. So, I think €1,000 a month is a fair price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment does sound very attractive, especially with its central location and proximity to amenities. However, I must be honest with you. As a student, I am on a tight budget, and I'm looking for a place that fits within my financial constraints. While I appreciate the quality of your apartment, I am unable to afford €1,000 per month. Is there any flexibility in the price you're offering?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Well, Max, I am willing to be flexible. However, I must admit that I am in a position where I can afford to be picky. So, I am willing to decrease the rent to €900 per month. Remember, this is a great apartment, and I am sure you will find it worth the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your willingness to negotiate is much appreciated. While €900 is more within my budget, I would still need to consider additional expenses such as utilities and furniture. Is there any possibility we could discuss a price closer to €800 per month? I believe this would be a fair reflection of the unfurnished state of the apartment and my student status.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I understand your concern. However, I must be honest with you. €800 per month is too low for this apartment. It is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. I am willing to decrease the rent to €850 per month, but I cannot go lower than that. Remember, this is a great apartment, and I am sure you will find it worth the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of €850 per month is more reasonable, considering the location and amenities. However, as a student, every euro counts. I would appreciate it if you could consider my final offer of €825 per month. I believe this would be a fair compromise, taking into account the unfurnished state of the apartment and my financial situation. If you agree to this price, I would be happy to sign the lease immediately.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your understanding of the value of my apartment. However, I must decline your offer of €825 per month. €850 per month is the lowest I can go for this apartment. It is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc. So, I believe €850 per month is a fair price. If you agree to this price, I am ready to sign the lease immediately.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your persistence is commendable. I respect your position and the value of your apartment. Under these circumstances, I am willing to agree to your offer of €850 per month. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the quality of the apartment and my financial constraints as a student. Let's proceed with signing the lease.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [850] Euro! Let's proceed with signing the lease.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent, Max! I'm glad we were able to reach an agreement. The lease will be prepared shortly. Please provide me with your contact information and I'll send it to you for signing. Thank you for your time and for choosing my apartment. I'm sure you'll be very happy here. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
